## ComponentManager.registerAppEvents() method

Register App class event handlers. App class is manually registered with type 'COMPONENT' in Bootstrap. This method loads its  decorated methods.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerAppEvents(target: any): void;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

target


</td><td>

</td><td>

The App class


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
